title: Repotar Health
subTitle: Repotar Health
body: A crowd sourcing health facility app for checking registered and unregistered health facilities and reporting unregistered health facilities for enhanced quality health service delivery in Nigeria.
appFunctions: Reporta Health permits searching for health facilities and services available within them
Mobile application for Android & iOS (Angular, Ionic, Cordova)

title: Truth X

appFunctions: Get Instant Push Notifications On Transaction Updates
Access Your Trade History Without Stress

title: Water Alliance
subTitle: Getting water just got easier
body: Water Alliance is an online platform for pure and healthy drinking water ordering. It focuses on customer-centricity, delivering quality water to your doorstep .

title: Gidi Agents
subTitle: Get Property Listing and information directly from your phone
body: Gidi Agents is the one stop for properties in Nigeria, the Gidi Agents Mobile Apps connects potential clients to professional real estate agents at any location in real time just like booking for a ride, thus bringing convenience to end users. At Gidi Agents, you donâ€™t have to worry anymore about fake agents, unsecure payments and properties showcased online not matching what you see in reality .

title: Research Ethics Application System
subTitle: REAPS provides services to academic and research institutions where research studies are conducted regularly
body: Research Ethics Application System The Research Ethics APplication System (REAPS) is an application that has been designed to facilitate the easy submission, processing, tracking and granting of ethics approval to individuals applying for research ethics approval from Institutional or Ethical Review Boards .
